(NSString *) + getVersionString
 Returns the public version. Returns the official version of the PCL library in the form of “@(#)PROGRAM:iSMP PROJECT:iSMP-x.y”. This is the function to use to check the version of the PCL library. To just get the version number, get the substring of the returned NSString object starting from index 30. More...

Detailed Description

Printer emulation.

This class provides native printing support for the terminal applications

Field Documentation

- (NSUInteger) _microlineCount
protected

The number of received microlines during a print session

- (NSUInteger) _microlineNumber
protected

The microline number sent by the Companion (contains the microline number in the first 3 bytes, and the printing session in the last byte)
